attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The health service, social services, education, housing and employment can not cope with the unlimited number of immigrants, Yes we do need some but not all, lets pick who we need as Austarlia,USA and Canada do so we can reduce our unemployment and improve this country not flood it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
